response.overview: Sheryl Crow's complete set from the Woodstock Festival in 1999 of which she says, "“It was a very MTV kind of moment. No one could bring in any food or water, and the bottled water was super-expensive. It bred rebellion. The porta-potty got turned over, and the next thing I know, I’m playing bass and there’s feces being thrown right where I’m playing. You can imagine the vibe before we went out, and Insane Clown Posse was right after us. The audience was frustrated and angry and it was everything but what Woodstock. It was by far the worst. It was the single worst gig I’ve ever been on. We got out of there as fast as we possibly could.”"  Source: https://www.rollingstone.com/music/music-news/woodstock-99-sheryl-crow-worst-gig-862968/
response.title: Sheryl Crow - Woodstock 1999 Festival
